overview: Mechanics can be a dirty business at the best of times, but it's never been dirtier than when this horny bunch of sluts get together to enjoy hard cock on demand...courtesy of a collection of well-hung studs who clearly never say no to a good drilling with their tools. Being Amsterdam, of course, there's no hesitation from anyone when it comes to sucking and fucking...be it indoors or out... and before you know it each one of these gorgeous beauties is getting their holes stretched to the max. No question about it, if you like shameless sluts being banged into ecstasy then this wanton escapade will satisfy you like nothing else; with a traditional blast of sticky Dutch baby-batter serving as a fitting finale to the frantic antics!
title: Fucking My Mechanic
